name: platinumIncomeCheck
description: High income requirement for platinum cards
content:
rule platinumIncomeCheck:
    if applicant.annualIncome >= 150000 then approveApplication
    if applicant.annualIncome < 100000 then rejectApplication
    if applicant.annualIncome >= 100000 and applicant.creditScore >= 750 then conditionalApproval
